plot: Marcel Duchamp returns from the dead, to punish all pretentious artists living in New York City, by imprisoning them in elevators and forcing them to play chess for all eternity.
title: The Curse of Marcel Duchamp
plot_es: Marcel Duchamp returns from the dead, to punish all pretentious artists living in New York City, by imprisoning them in elevators and forcing them to play chess for all eternity.
plot_en: Marcel Duchamp returns from the dead, to punish all pretentious artists living in New York City, by imprisoning them in elevators and forcing them to play chess for all eternity.
